trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Where-Object
trans-unit.target: Where-Object

trans-unit.source: Where-Object
trans-unit.target: Where-Object

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 简述

trans-unit.source: Selects objects from a collection based on their property values.
trans-unit.target: 根据属性值从集合中选择对象。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 语法

trans-unit.source: EqualSet (Default)
trans-unit.target: EqualSet （默认值）

trans-unit.source: ScriptBlockSet
trans-unit.target: ScriptBlockSet

trans-unit.target: CaseSensitiveLessThanSet

trans-unit.target: LessOrEqualSet

trans-unit.target: NotContainsSet

trans-unit.source: CaseSensitiveNotContainsSet
trans-unit.target: CaseSensitiveNotContainsSet

trans-unit.source: CaseSensitiveLessOrEqualSet
trans-unit.target: CaseSensitiveLessOrEqualSet

trans-unit.target: 嵌入

trans-unit.source: CaseSensitiveInSet
trans-unit.target: CaseSensitiveInSet

trans-unit.target: NotInSet

trans-unit.source: CaseSensitiveNotInSet
trans-unit.target: CaseSensitiveNotInSet

trans-unit.target: LikeSet

trans-unit.target: CaseSensitiveEqualSet

trans-unit.target: CaseSensitiveMatchSet

trans-unit.target: IsNotSet

trans-unit.source: NotLikeSet
trans-unit.target: NotLikeSet

trans-unit.source: CaseSensitiveNotMatchSet
trans-unit.target: CaseSensitiveNotMatchSet

trans-unit.target: ContainsSet

trans-unit.target: CaseSensitiveContainsSet

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: The **Where-Object** cmdlet selects objects that have particular property values from the collection of objects that are passed to it.
trans-unit.target: **Where-object** cmdlet 选择具有特定属性值从传递给它的对象的集合的对象。

trans-unit.source: For example you can use the **Where-Object** cmdlet to select files that were created after a certain date, events with a particular ID, or computers with a particular version of Windows.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用 **Where-object** cmdlet 来选择文件的某个特定日期之后创建具有特定 ID 的事件或具有特定的 Windows 版本的计算机。

trans-unit.source: Beginning in Windows PowerShell 3.0, there are two different ways to construct a **Where-Object** command.
trans-unit.target: 从 Windows PowerShell 3.0 开始，有两种不同的方法来构造 **Where-object** 命令。

trans-unit.source: **Script block**.
You can use a script block to specify the property name, a comparison operator, and a property value.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用脚本块指定属性名称、比较运算符和属性值。

trans-unit.source: Where-Object returns all objects for which the script block statement is true.
trans-unit.target: Where-Object 将返回脚本块语句为 true 的所有对象。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following command gets processes in the Normal priority class, that is, processes where the value of the **PriorityClass** property equals "Normal".
trans-unit.target: 例如，下面的命令，它是在正常的优先级类中，获取进程，进程的值 **PriorityClass** 属性值等于"Normal"。

trans-unit.source: All Windows PowerShell comparison operators are valid in the script block format.
trans-unit.target: 所有 Windows PowerShell 比较运算符在脚本块格式中都有效。

trans-unit.source: For more information about comparison operators, see about_Comparison_Operators (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113217).
trans-unit.target: 有关比较运算符的详细信息，请参阅 about_Comparison_Operators (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113217)。

trans-unit.source: **Comparison statement**.
trans-unit.target: **比较语句**。

trans-unit.source: You can also write a comparison statement, which is much more like natural language.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以编写比较语句，它更像自然语言。

trans-unit.source: Comparison statements were introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入了比较语句。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following commands also get processes that have a priority class of "Normal".
trans-unit.target: 例如，以下语句也会获取优先级类为“Normal”的进程。

trans-unit.source: These commands are equivalent and can be used interchangeably.
trans-unit.target: 这些命令是等效的，因此可以互换使用。

trans-unit.source: Beginning in Windows PowerShell 3.0, **Where-Object** adds comparison operators as parameters in a **Where-Object** command.
trans-unit.target: 从 Windows PowerShell 3.0 开始 **Where-object** 将比较运算符添加作为中的参数 **Where-object** 命令。

trans-unit.source: Unless specified, all operators are case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 除非另有指定，否则所有运算符都不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: Prior to Windows PowerShell 3.0, the comparison operators in the Windows PowerShell language could be used only in script blocks.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 之前，Windows PowerShell 语言中的比较运算符仅可在脚本块中使用。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: This command gets a list of all services that are currently stopped.
trans-unit.target: 此命令可获取当前停止的所有服务的列表。

trans-unit.source: The "$_" symbol represents each object that is passed to the **Where-Object** cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: "$_"符号表示传递给每个对象 **Where-object** cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: The first command uses the script block format.
trans-unit.target: 第一个命令使用脚本块格式。

trans-unit.source: The second command uses the comparison statement format.
trans-unit.target: 第二个命令使用比较语句格式。

trans-unit.source: The commands are equivalent and can be used interchangeably.
trans-unit.target: 这两个命令是等效的，因此可以互换使用。

trans-unit.source: This command lists processes that have a working set greater than 25,000 kilobytes (KB).
trans-unit.target: 此命令将列出具有大于 25,000 千字节 (KB) 的工作集的进程。

trans-unit.source: Because the value of the WorkingSet property is stored in bytes, the value of 25,000 is multiplied by 1,024.
trans-unit.target: 由于 WorkingSet 的值以字节为单位进行存储，因此 25000 的值将乘以 1024。

trans-unit.source: The first command uses the script block format.
trans-unit.target: 第一个命令使用脚本块格式。

trans-unit.source: The second command uses the comparison statement format.
trans-unit.target: 第二个命令使用比较语句格式。

trans-unit.source: The commands are equivalent and can be used interchangeably.
trans-unit.target: 这两个命令是等效的，因此可以互换使用。

trans-unit.source: This command gets the processes that have a **ProcessName** property value that begins with the letter "p".
trans-unit.target: 此命令将获取拥有的进程的 **ProcessName** 以字母"p"开头的属性值。

trans-unit.source: The match operator lets you use regular expression matches.
trans-unit.target: match 运算符使你可以使用正则表达式匹配。

trans-unit.source: The first command uses the script block format.
trans-unit.target: 第一个命令使用脚本块格式。

trans-unit.source: The second command uses the comparison statement format.
trans-unit.target: 第二个命令使用比较语句格式。

trans-unit.source: The commands are equivalent and can be used interchangeably.
trans-unit.target: 这两个命令是等效的，因此可以互换使用。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use the new comparison statement format of the **Where-Object** cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何使用新比较语句格式 **Where-object** cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: The first command uses the comparison statement format.
trans-unit.target: 第一个命令使用比较语句格式。

trans-unit.source: In this command, no aliases are used and all parameters include the parameter name.
trans-unit.target: 在此命令中，未使用别名，并且所有参数都包含参数名称。

trans-unit.source: The second command is the more natural use of the comparison command format.
trans-unit.target: 第二个命令是比较命令格式的更自然的用法。

trans-unit.source: The "where" alias is substituted for the "Where-Object" cmdlet name and all optional parameter names are omitted.
trans-unit.target: “where”别名取代了“Where-Object”cmdlet 名称，并且省略了所有可选参数名称。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to write commands that return items that are true or false or have any value for a specified property.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何编写可返回项（true 或 false）的命令或具有指定属性的任意值的命令。

trans-unit.source: The example shows both the script block and comparison statement formats for the command.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示该命令的脚本块和比较语句格式。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to create a **Where-Object** command with multiple conditions.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何创建 **Where-object** 命令包含多个条件。

trans-unit.source: This command gets non-core modules that support the Updatable Help feature.
trans-unit.target: 此命令可获取用于支持可更新帮助功能的非核心模块。

trans-unit.source: The command uses the **ListAvailable** parameter of the Get-Module cmdlet to get all modules on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 该命令使用 **ListAvailable** Get-module cmdlet 来获取计算机上的所有模块的参数。

trans-unit.source: A pipeline operator sends the modules to the **Where-Object** cmdlet, which gets modules whose names do not begin with "Microsoft" or "PS" and have a value for the **HelpInfoURI** property, which tells Windows PowerShell where to find updated help files for the module.
trans-unit.target: 管道运算符将发送到模块 **Where-object** cmdlet，后者将获取其名称不以"Microsoft"或"PS"开头并具有的值的模块 **HelpInfoURI** 属性，它告知 Windows PowerShell 在哪里可以找到该模块更新的帮助文件。

trans-unit.source: The comparison statements are connected by the **-And** logical operator.
trans-unit.target: 比较语句由连接 **-和** 逻辑运算符。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the script block command format.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用脚本块命令格式。

trans-unit.source: Logical operators, such as -And and -Or, are valid only in script blocks.
trans-unit.target: 逻辑运算符（例如 -And 和 -Or）仅在脚本块中有效。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use them in the comparison statement format of a Where-Object command.
trans-unit.target: 无法以 Where-Object 命令的比较语句格式使用它们。

trans-unit.source: For more information about Windows PowerShell logical operators, see about_Logical_Operators (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113238).
trans-unit.target: 有关 Windows PowerShell 逻辑运算符的详细信息，请参阅 about_Logical_Operators (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113238)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the Updatable Help feature, see about_Updatable_Help (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=235801).
trans-unit.target: 有关可更新帮助功能的详细信息，请参阅 about_Updatable_Help (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=235801)。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: -CContains
trans-unit.target: -包含

trans-unit.source: Specifies the case-sensitive Contains operator, which gets objects from a collection when the property value of the object is an exact match for the specified value
trans-unit.target: 指定区分大小写的 Contains 运算符，此运算符可在对象的属性值与指定值完全匹配时从集合中获取对象。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: "Contains" refers to a collection of values and is true when the collection contains an item that is an exact match for the specified value.
trans-unit.target: “Contains”指的是值的集合，并且在集合包含与指定值完全匹配的项时为 true。

trans-unit.source: If the input is a single object, Windows PowerShell converts it to a collection of one object.
trans-unit.target: 如果输入是单个对象，则 Windows PowerShell 会将其转换为单个对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入的。

trans-unit.source: -CEQ
trans-unit.target: -CEQ

trans-unit.source: Specifies the case-sensitive Equals operator, which gets objects when the property value is the same as the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 指定区分大小写的 Equals 运算符，此运算符可在属性值与指定值相同时获取对象。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入的。

trans-unit.source: -CGE
trans-unit.target: -CGE

trans-unit.source: Specifies the case-sensitive Greater-than-or-equal value, which gets objects when the property value is greater than or equal to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 指定区分大小写的 Greater-than-or-equal 值，此值可在属性值大于或等于指定值时获取对象。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入的。

trans-unit.source: -CGT
trans-unit.target: -则 CGT

trans-unit.source: Specifies the case-sensitive Greater-than property, which gets objects when the property value is greater than the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 指定区分大小写的 Greater-than 属性，此属性可在属性值大于指定值时获取对象。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入的。

trans-unit.source: -CIn
trans-unit.target: -CIn

trans-unit.source: Specifies the case-sensitive In operator, which gets objects when the property value includes the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 指定区分大小写的 In 运算符，此运算符可在属性值包含指定值时获取对象。

trans-unit.source: For example: Get-Process | where -Value "svchost" -CIn ProcessName
trans-unit.target: 例如︰ Get-process |其中-Value"svchost"-CIn ProcessName

trans-unit.source: The In operator is much like the Contains operator, except that the property and value positions are reversed.
trans-unit.target: In 运算符与 Contains 运算符非常类似，只不过属性和值的位置进行了互换。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following statements are both true.
trans-unit.target: 例如，以下语句都为 true。

trans-unit.source: "abc", "def" -CContains "abc"
trans-unit.target: "abc", "def" -CContains "abc"

trans-unit.source: "abc" -CIn "abc", "def"
trans-unit.target: "abc" -CIn "abc", "def"

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入的。

trans-unit.source: -CLE
trans-unit.target: -CLE

trans-unit.source: Specifies the case-sensitive Less-than-or-equal operator, which gets objects when the property value is less-than or equal to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 指定区分大小写的 Less-than-or-equal 运算符，此值可在属性值小于或等于指定值时获取对象。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入的。

trans-unit.source: -CLT
trans-unit.target: -CLT

trans-unit.source: Specifies the case-sensitive Less-than operator, which gets objects when the property value is less-than the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 指定区分大小写的 Less-than 运算符，此运算符可在属性值小于指定值时获取对象。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入的。

trans-unit.source: -CLike
trans-unit.target: -CLike

trans-unit.source: Specifies the case-sensitive Like operator, which gets objects when the property value matches a value that includes wildcard characters.
trans-unit.target: 指定区分大小写的 Like 运算符，此运算符可在属性值与包含通配符的值匹配时获取对象。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入的。

trans-unit.source: -CMatch
trans-unit.target: -CMatch

trans-unit.source: Specifies the case-sensitive Match operator, which gets objects when the property value matches the specified regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 指定区分大小写的 Match 运算符，此运算符可在属性值与指定的正则表达式匹配时获取对象。

trans-unit.source: When the input is scalar, the matched value is saved in $Matches automatic variable.
trans-unit.target: 当输入是标量时，配置的值将保存在 $Matches 自动变量中。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入的。

trans-unit.source: -CNE
trans-unit.target: -CNE

trans-unit.source: Specifies the case-sensitive Not-Equals operator, which gets objects when the property value is different than the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 指定区分大小写的 Not-equals 运算符，此运算符可在属性值不同于指定值时获取对象。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入的。

trans-unit.source: -CNotContains
trans-unit.target: -CNotContains

trans-unit.source: Specifies the case-sensitive Not-Contains operator, which gets objects when the property value of the object is not an exact match for the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 指定区分大小写的 Not-Contains 运算符，此运算符可在对象的属性值与指定值完全匹配时获取对象。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: "NotContains" and "CNotContains refer to a collection of values and are true when the collection does not contains any items that are an exact match for the specified value.
trans-unit.target: “NotContains”和“CNotContains”指的是值的集合，并且在该集合不包含与指定值完全匹配的任何项时为 true。

trans-unit.source: If the input is a single object, Windows PowerShell converts it to a collection of one object.
trans-unit.target: 如果输入是单个对象，则 Windows PowerShell 会将其转换为单个对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入的。

trans-unit.source: -CNotIn
trans-unit.target: -CNotIn

trans-unit.source: Specifies the case-sensitive Not-In operator, which gets objects when the property value is not an exact match for the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 指定区分大小写的 Not-In 运算符，此运算符可在属性值与指定值完全匹配时获取对象。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: The Not-In and CNot-In operators are much like the Not-Contains and CNot-Contains operators, except that the property and value positions are reversed.
trans-unit.target: Not-In 和 CNot-In 运算符与 Not-Contains 和 CNot-Contains 运算符非常类似，只不过属性和值的位置进行了互换。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following statements are true.
trans-unit.target: 例如，以下语句为 true。

trans-unit.source: "abc", "def" -CNotContains "Abc"
trans-unit.target: "abc", "def" -CNotContains "Abc"

trans-unit.source: "abc" -CNotIn "Abc", "def"
trans-unit.target: "abc" -CNotIn "Abc", "def"

trans-unit.source: -CNotLike
trans-unit.target: -CNotLike

trans-unit.source: Specifies the case-sensitive Not-Like operator, which gets objects when the property value does not match a value that includes wildcard characters.
trans-unit.target: 指定区分大小写的 Not-Like 运算符，此运算符可在属性值与包含通配符的值不匹配时获取对象。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入的。

trans-unit.source: -CNotMatch
trans-unit.target: -CNotMatch

trans-unit.source: Specifies the case-sensitive Not-match operator, which gets objects when the property value does not match the specified regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 指定 Not-match 运算符，此运算符可在属性值与指定的正则表达式不匹配时获取对象。

trans-unit.source: When the input is scalar, the matched value is saved in $Matches automatic variable.
trans-unit.target: 当输入是标量时，配置的值将保存在 $Matches 自动变量中。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入的。

trans-unit.source: -Contains
trans-unit.target: -包含

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Contains operator, which gets objects when any item in the property value of the object is an exact match for the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 指定 Contains 运算符，此运算符可在对象属性值中的任何项与指定值完全匹配时获取对象。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: If the property value contains a single object, Windows PowerShell converts it to a collection of one object.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性值包含单个对象，则 Windows PowerShell 会将其转换为单个对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入的。

trans-unit.source: -EQ
trans-unit.target: -EQ

trans-unit.source: Specifies the equals operator, which gets objects when the property value is the same as the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 指定 equals 运算符，此运算符可在属性值与指定值相同时获取对象。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入的。

trans-unit.source: -FilterScript
trans-unit.target: -FilterScript

trans-unit.source: Specifies the script block that is used to filter the objects.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于筛选对象的脚本块。

trans-unit.source: Enclose the script block in braces ( {} ).
trans-unit.target: 将脚本块括在大括号 ({}) 中。

trans-unit.source: The parameter name (-FilterScript) is optional.
trans-unit.target: 参数名称 (-FilterScript) 是可选项。

trans-unit.source: -GE
trans-unit.target: -GE

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Greater-than-or-equal operator, which gets objects when the property value is greater than or equal to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 指定 Greater-than-or-equal 运算符，此运算符可在属性值大于或等于指定值时获取对象。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入的。

trans-unit.source: -GT
trans-unit.target: -GT

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Greater-than operator, which gets objects when the property value is greater than the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 指定 Greater-than 运算符，此运算符可在属性值大于指定值时获取对象。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入的。

trans-unit.source: -In
trans-unit.target: 接

trans-unit.source: Specifies the In operator, which gets objects when the property value matches any of the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 指定 In 运算符，此运算符可在属性值与任何指定值匹配时获取对象。

trans-unit.source: For example: Get-Process | where -Property ProcessName -in -Value "Svchost", "TaskHost", "WsmProvHost"
trans-unit.target: 例如︰ Get-process |where-属性 ProcessName-中-值"Svchost"、"TaskHost"、"WsmProvHost"

trans-unit.source: If the value of the **Value** parameter is a single object, Windows PowerShell converts it to a collection of one object.
trans-unit.target: 如果值 **值** 参数为单个对象时，Windows PowerShell 将其转换为单个对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: If the property value of an object is an array, Windows PowerShell uses reference equality to determine a match.
trans-unit.target: 如果某个对象的值是一个数组，则 Windows PowerShell 将使用引用相等性来确定匹配。

trans-unit.source: **Where-Object** returns the object only if the value of the **Property** parameter and any value of the **Value** parameter are the same instance of an object.
trans-unit.target: **Where-object** 才返回该对象的值 **属性** 参数和任何值的 **值** 参数是一个对象的相同实例。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入的。

trans-unit.source: -InputObject
trans-unit.target: -InputObject

trans-unit.source: Specifies the objects to be filtered.
trans-unit.target: 指定要筛选的对象。

trans-unit.source: You can also pipe the objects to **Where-Object**.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以通过管道将对象传送到 **Where-object**。

trans-unit.source: When you use the InputObject parameter with Where-Object, instead of piping command results to Where-Object, the InputObject value-even if the value is a collection that is the result of a command, such as **-InputObject (Get-Process)**-is treated as a single object.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 InputObject 参数与 Where-object，而不是给 Where-object 管道命令结果时，InputObject 值-甚至是如果值为一个集合，其中是命令的结果如 **-InputObject (Get-process)**-将被视为单个对象。

trans-unit.source: Because InputObject cannot return individual properties from an array or collection of objects, it is recommended that if you use Where-Object to filter a collection of objects for those objects that have specific values in defined properties, you use Where-Object in the pipeline, as shown in the examples in this topic.
trans-unit.target: 由于 InputObject 无法返回来自数组或对象集合的单个属性，因此如果你使用 Where-Object 为在定义的属性中具有特定值的对象筛选对象集合，则建议在管道中使用 Where-Object，如本主题的示例中所示。

trans-unit.source: -Is
Specifies the Is operator, which gets objects when the property value is an instance of the specified .NET Framework type.
trans-unit.target: 指定 Is 运算符，此运算符可在属性值为指定 .NET Framework 类型的实例时获取对象。

trans-unit.source: Enclose the type name in square brackets.
trans-unit.target: 将类型名称括在方括号中。

trans-unit.source: For example,
trans-unit.target: 例如，

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入的。

trans-unit.source: -IsNot
trans-unit.target: -IsNot

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Is-Not operator, which gets objects when the property value is not an instance of the specified .NET Framework type.
trans-unit.target: 指定 Is-Not 运算符，此运算符可在属性值非指定 .NET Framework 类型的实例时获取对象。

trans-unit.source: For example,
trans-unit.target: 例如，

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入的。

trans-unit.source: -LE
trans-unit.target: -LE

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Less-than-or-equals operator.
trans-unit.target: 指定 Less-than-or-equals 运算符。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入的。

trans-unit.source: -LT
trans-unit.target: -LT

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Less-than operator, which gets objects when the property value is less than the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 指定 Less-than 运算符，此运算符可在属性值小于指定值时获取对象。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入的。

trans-unit.source: -Like
trans-unit.target: 的类似

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Like operator, which gets objects when the property value matches a value that includes wildcard characters.
trans-unit.target: 指定 Like 运算符，此运算符可在属性值与包含通配符的值匹配时获取对象。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入的。

trans-unit.source: -Match
trans-unit.target: 匹配

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Match operator, which gets objects when the property value matches the specified regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 指定 Match 运算符，此运算符可在属性值与指定的正则表达式匹配时获取对象。

trans-unit.source: When the input is scalar, the matched value is saved in $Matches automatic variable.
trans-unit.target: 当输入是标量时，配置的值将保存在 $Matches 自动变量中。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入的。

trans-unit.source: -NE
trans-unit.target: -NE

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Not-equals operator, which gets objects when the property value is different than the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 指定 Not-equals 运算符，此运算符可在属性值不同于指定值时获取对象。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入的。

trans-unit.source: -NotContains
trans-unit.target: -NotContains

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Not-Contains operator, which gets objects when none of the items in the property value is an exact match for the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 指定 Not-Contains 运算符，此运算符可在属性值中的任何项都与指定值不完全匹配时获取对象。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: "NotContains" refers to a collection of values and is true when the collection does not contain any items that are an exact match for the specified value.
trans-unit.target: “NotContains”指的是值的集合，并且在该集合不包含任何与指定值完全匹配的项时为 true。

trans-unit.source: If the input is a single object, Windows PowerShell converts it to a collection of one object.
trans-unit.target: 如果输入是单个对象，则 Windows PowerShell 会将其转换为单个对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入的。

trans-unit.source: -NotIn
trans-unit.target: -不足

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Not-In operator, which gets objects when the property value is not an exact match for any of the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 指定 Not-In 运算符，此运算符可在属性值不与任何指定值完全匹配时获取对象。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: If the value of the **Value** parameter is a single object, Windows PowerShell converts it to a collection of one object.
trans-unit.target: 如果值 **值** 参数为单个对象时，Windows PowerShell 将其转换为单个对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: If the property value of an object is an array, Windows PowerShell uses reference equality to determine a match.
trans-unit.target: 如果某个对象的值是一个数组，则 Windows PowerShell 将使用引用相等性来确定匹配。

trans-unit.source: **Where-Object** returns the object only if the value of the **Property** parameter and any value of the **Value** parameter are not the same instance of an object.
trans-unit.target: **Where-object** 才返回该对象的值 **属性** 参数和任何值的 **值** 参数不是对象的相同实例。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入的。

trans-unit.source: -NotLike
trans-unit.target: -NotLike

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Not-Like operator, which gets objects when the property value does not match a value that includes wildcard characters.
trans-unit.target: 指定 Not-Like 运算符，此运算符可在属性值与包含通配符的值不匹配时获取对象。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入的。

trans-unit.source: -NotMatch
trans-unit.target: -Notmatch 将

trans-unit.source: Specifies the not-match operator, which gets objects when the property value does not match the specified regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 指定 not-match 运算符，此运算符可在属性值与指定的正则表达式不匹配时获取对象。

trans-unit.source: When the input is scalar, the matched value is saved in $Matches automatic variable.
trans-unit.target: 当输入是标量时，配置的值将保存在 $Matches 自动变量中。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入的。

trans-unit.source: -Property
trans-unit.target: 属性

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of an object property.
trans-unit.target: 指定对象属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: The parameter name (-Property) is optional.
trans-unit.target: 参数名称 (-Property) 是可选项。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入的。

trans-unit.source: -Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: Specifies a property value.
trans-unit.target: 指定属性值。

trans-unit.source: The parameter name (-Value) is optional.
trans-unit.target: 参数名称 (-Value) 是可选项。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入的。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 支持以下常见参数:-调试-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction、-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 和-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输入

trans-unit.source: System.Management.Automation.PSObject
trans-unit.target: System.Management.Automation.PSObject

trans-unit.source: You can pipe the objects to be filtered to Where-Object.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过管道将要筛选的对象传递给 Where-Object。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输出

trans-unit.source: Object
trans-unit.target: 对象

trans-unit.source: Where-Object returns selected items from the input object set.
trans-unit.target: Where-Object 将返回输入对象集中的选定项。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: Beginning in Windows PowerShell 4.0, Where() operator behavior has changed.
trans-unit.target: 从 Windows PowerShell 4.0 开始，Where() 运算符行为已更改。

trans-unit.source: Collection.Where('property -match name') no longer accepts string expressions in the format "Property -CompareOperator Value".
trans-unit.target: Collection.Where (' 属性的匹配项名称) 不再接受"属性 CompareOperator Value"格式的字符串表达式。

trans-unit.source: However, the Where() operator accepts string expressions in the format of a scriptblock; this is still supported.
trans-unit.target: 但是，Where() 运算符接受脚本块格式的字符串表达式；仍支持此行为。

trans-unit.source: The following examples show the behavior that has changed.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例演示已更改的行为。

trans-unit.source: The following two examples show Where() object behavior that is no longer supported.
trans-unit.target: 以下两个示例演示不再受支持的 Where() 对象行为。

trans-unit.source: The following three examples show Where() object behavior that is supported in Windows PowerShell 4.0 and forward.
trans-unit.target: 以下三个示例演示 Windows PowerShell 4.0 和更高版本中支持的 Where() 对象。
